duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot and resolve mobile customer technology and service issues, including repair, billing, and accounts.
Repair a variety of services and equipment, using patience and effective communication skills to uncover customer needs, answer questions, and leave a positive impression on customer interactions.
Provide over-the-phone support on a wide range of mobile products and services, including accounts and billing, diagnostics, enhancements, and repairs.
Use advanced diagnostic tools to address technical inquiries and get services running smoothly, talking customers through fixes.
Create documents that ensure customers’ service histories are available for future Representatives.
Stay on top of the latest technology and provide troubleshooting for customer-facing systems.
Receive fully paid training and stay up-to-date with training updates on new products, services, and upgrades.
Create satisfying customer experiences by understanding products and customers’ sense of urgency.
Engage in a deliberate path to success with well-established career paths for advancement.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (Preferred: 6 months or more of customer service experience)
